L

Lang - Class in it.bori.jbfw.core.i18n
Language object, contains information about single languages file has method for retrieve language word
Lang(String, String) - Constructor for class it.bori.jbfw.core.i18n.Lang
Default constructor of the class, require the languages name and it's source.
lang - Variable in class it.bori.jbfw.core.i18n.Lang
Languages name, can be "it" or "it-IT" for example
langList - Variable in class it.bori.jbfw.core.i18n.Lang
Properties object containing all the key with respective languages value
LangNotFoundException - Exception in it.bori.jbfw.core.exception
Exception launched when a languages file it's not found where "langsFile" says
LangNotFoundException(String) - Constructor for exception it.bori.jbfw.core.exception.LangNotFoundException
Default constructor, need the lang name for specify what languages cannot be obtained
langs - Static variable in class it.bori.jbfw.core.i18n.LanguagesLoader
Contains a list of languages available
langSource - Variable in class it.bori.jbfw.core.i18n.Lang
languages resource where file it's stored ( do not include extension, and extension must be "i18n" else it will throw LangNotFoundException )
LanguagesLoader - Class in it.bori.jbfw.core.i18n
Class used for manage i18n languages
LanguagesLoader() - Constructor for class it.bori.jbfw.core.i18n.LanguagesLoader
 
LEVEL_CALLED - Static variable in class it.bori.jbfw.core.debug.logger.Logger
Contains how many times the specified LogLevel has been called, when application "die", it's print all this information
LEVEL_ERROR - Static variable in class it.bori.jbfw.core.debug.logger.Logger
Use this, to "define" an error
LEVEL_INFO - Static variable in class it.bori.jbfw.core.debug.logger.Logger
Use this, to "define" a simply info to userAdmin
LEVEL_WARNING - Static variable in class it.bori.jbfw.core.debug.logger.Logger
Use this, to "define" a potential error, or simply a warning
loadLang(String) - Static method in class it.bori.jbfw.core.i18n.LanguagesLoader
Load a list of languages from a langFile
log(int, String, boolean) - Static method in class it.bori.jbfw.core.debug.logger.Logger
Write log inside the output file, and if requested, alert user with a message
log(String) - Static method in class it.bori.jbfw.core.debug.logger.Logger
Simply log a message with INFO status and don't report with dialog to user.
log(Exception) - Static method in class it.bori.jbfw.core.debug.logger.Logger
Simply out printing exception, getting message and title from exception
Logger - Class in it.bori.jbfw.core.debug.logger
Logger Class, simply manage the "out printing logging"
Logger() - Constructor for class it.bori.jbfw.core.debug.logger.Logger
